price: Siku itapo wapasukia ardhi mbio mbio! Mkusanyo huo kwetu ni mwepesi.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ
footnotes: Siku itakapo wapasukilia ardhi, na watoke humo mbio mbio wakikimbilia mkutanoni...Hilo jambo kuu la kuwakusanya wote ni dogo na jepesi kwetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma tashaqqaqu al-arḍu ʿanhum sirāʿan dhālika ḥashrun ʿalaynā yasīrun
